body.p: An entity shall recognise a liability and expense for termination benefits at the earlier of the following dates:

li.p: when the entity can no longer withdraw the offer of those benefits; and
when the entity recognises costs for a restructuring that is within the scope of IAS 37 and involves the payment of termination benefits.
